google.description: Search for similar images or sites containing your image on Google.

info.title: Google Command
info.description: Uses puppeteer to perform a Google reverse image search of your image. Works for most images. May not work for new OC or heavily edited images.
info.input: A direct link to your image. Must be a **direct** link. The link must be accessable for everyone.
info.output:
_Success_: First this will send an embed with clues from Google. Some keywords as well as the first <=5 images from the search will be shown alongside a screenshot of the search entries first page. Secondly this will send an embed containing the first <=5 sites which host your image.

_Error_: This will send an error embed for the image search, if no images are found. The second part of the success embed may be sent if some results are found.

help.description: Get an overview of all commands and information of each specific command.

rps.description: Play rock paper scissors against the bot.

saucenao.description: Search for the source of your image on SauceNao.

tineye.description: Search for the source of your image on TinEye.
